properties.desc: man pushed a toddler on bike straight toward us and told us â€œoh, you're fine. don't worry."
man biking directly toward us while we were crossing the road. he didn't bother to alter his path and didn't stop or slow down at the stop sign.
man without mask walking dog. we moved so he moved closer to us?
man with dog running straight toward us even when we moved. taking up 3x more space than us.
security guard walks right up behind us while we'd stopped to read a sign. probably 4 feet? didn't have a chance to move since he snuck up behind.
man running while we were waiting for the crosswalk and didn't bother to try to keep any distance.
man riding bike who sharply turned a corner and didn't try to keep any distance.
man wearing a mask biking toward us with a child. came up on us from behind. cut it within a few feet not giving us time to move.
man walking brazenly toward us with his chipotle takeout
man with no mask casually walking his dog down the middle of the sidewalk.
man bursts through apartment building door out onto sidewalk paying no mind to anyone walking by.
man biking alongside us while we were crossing the road. no need for him to get close to us, yet he did.
man rounded the corner while we were waiting for the crosswalk signal. kept some distance but he could've tried harder.
man and woman walking side by side on the sidewalk. did not attempt single file.
man walking toward us in crosswalk. he made no attempt to move.
man wearing a mask riding a skateboard. seemed like he was going to give us room but then came toward us.
man slams through apartment building door out onto sidewalk paying no mind to anyone walking by.
man biking on sidewalk straight toward us.
man walking straight down the middle of the sidewalk paying no mind to other people in his vicinity.
man biking on the sidewalk yelling at us to move out of his way. are you fucking kidding me?
man riding bike who sharply turned a corner and didn't try to keep any distance.
man walking two dogs steps out from behind a gate right onto sidewalk without bothering to look, blatantly cutting us off.
man walking down the middle of the sidewalk. didn't bother to move over.
man walking. he didn't bother to move at all.
two men walking side by side. they didn't bother to even try walking single file.
